BY DEFINITION, you can't be Bitcoin Maximalist and support altcoins at the same time:  BTC suports LTC & XMR.  BCH supports ETH & ZEC.  BSV stands alone,   Because they expect to be the only chain left standing after absorbing all the use cases.
BCH loves Ethereum.  BSV hates Ethereum.  BTC loves Litecoin.  BSV hates Litecoin.

It would be awesome if the bottom is in for #LTC. I bought my first LTC for $96 in december of 2017. Then much more around high $200. And some at $300. As the market started to go down, i bought more,  Caught a COUPLE of falling knives 🗡🗡🗡. I am still here! LTC = freedom
